---
title: "diamonds"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
diamonds_df <- ggplot2::diamonds
curr_time <- paste0(timestamp())
ggplot2::ggplot(data = diamonds_df, 
                ggplot2::aes(x = carat,
                             y = price)) +
  ggplot2::geom_line() +
  ggplot2::labs(title = curr_time)
```
